Agency is defined as the capacity to act. Decentralizing it increases this capacity by distributing one’s agency between those we trust; formalizing feedback loops and social support.


As a collective we use this framework to work on both tangible and speculative projects that don’t aim to be commercially viable but rather shape viable futures.

The Why Paper Use Framework
  • Substack ↗
  • Discord ↗
  • Colophon
